p: When compared to that at either the LGM or present, climate summary statistics during the LIG (Fig. 2a and b) showed both enlarged seasonal temperature and precipitation, being warmer in summers, wetter in wet seasons, colder in winters and drier in dry seasons (Additional file 5: Figure S2). In addition, the climatic variations increased with latitude in this region at the LIG (Fig. 2c and Additional file 6: Figure S3).
